title: UNIQLOCK!
content:
HOLY JAPANESES!! THIS SITE IS AMAZING!!

And this typeface too! Do you know its name?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [UNIQLOCK.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013102930/http:/typophile.com/files/UNIQLOCK.jpg) | 94.86 KB |

 [‹ Metropolis Magazine Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013102930/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45305 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old BNSF Logo Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013102930/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45143 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cesarkohl

comments.content: It is a custom font desgined by [Kashiwa Sato](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013102930/http:/kashiwasato.com/#uniqlo_soho_ny) (佐藤可士和), a Japanese designer.
The L is absolutely fabulous. How about that white space?
OK, does the L not bother anyone???
Indeed, I’m bothered by several characters of the font. The designer is a famous graphic designer in Japan. But I doubt if he has a great knowledge of typography.
